func.title: RemoveEffect

param.name: name
param.desc: Name of the effect without preceding 'Fx'. You can use '*' and '?' wildcards.

param.name: target
param.desc: Target object from which to remove an effect. If 0, the global effects list will be searched.

param.name: index
param.desc: Effect index. If name is given then if there are more effects matching the search mask the one with the given index is refered to. If name is not given then the effect with the correspoding effect number will be changed. For indices it is guaranteed that, in contrast to effect numbers, they start at 0 and count up to the number of effects

param.name: no_calls
param.desc: If not 0, no Stop calls will be made.

param.name: new_timer
param.desc: New timer interval. If -1, the previous value will be kept. Otherwise, this call will also reset effect time.

func.remark: See GetEffect for an example. Warning: if an effect is meant to delete itself using this function, only use target and index, not name!
